name: Kayla Arevalo
text: Edited: Kids wanted pizza and breadsticks sounded good drove 40min round trip to pick it up since they don't deliver where we live. Get home neither order of breadsticks had any seasoning and were completely dry. Originally this was a 1 star but the guys working were awesome about making it right.

name: Johanna Brown
text: First time I have ordered pizza from here in a while, but I wish i had just gone with our regular Dominos. I ordered a stuffed crust pizza but the crust is so wafer thin that it can't even support the three toppings I put on it. I guess I expected thick, fluffy, cheesy crust and I just didn't get that. It is seriously like 3mm thin....

name: Jonathon Nolan
text: Shelton Pizza Hut has stepped up their game! I moved out of Shelton yearsssss ago but come back to visit family on a regular basis. I ordered a pizza to go with the app and redeemed some points (we order pizza enough to build up for free â€¦More

name: Joseph and Frank
text: Pizza Hut where did you go wrong. Your pan pizza used to be the best, but now the crust is rubbery, has NO CRUNCH to the bottom anymore and taste like it was made from dough out of a can. You used to use almost all mozzarella cheese on your â€¦More

name: Samantha Thompson
text: How ca you live .2 miles away and no delivery. Call, no answer. Says they're open but not even carry out. Good thing dominos right down the street could take your business.

name: Tina Moon
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery and it was delicious!  Ample toppings, great customer service and quick delivery.  Thank you!

name: Michael Barrow
text: I think it's pizza hut in general,  they just do not make a good pie any longer. Everytime we order a deep dish pie it's small, meaning NOT A DEEP DISH they are cutting corners for years now and just suck, I always ask for extra sauce and â€¦More

name: Rick Foxx
text: I had not been to pizza hut in a few years but quickly remembered why. I ordered 3 personal pans that came up to almost $23.00 and mentioned that, that seemed kinda high... the man working there said that it would be cheaper if I got a â€¦More

name: Deadpool Killer
text: I used to love pizza hut it was the best pizza I honestly thought there was around. As a kid I remember going to pizza hut with my family and for the longest time I thought it was the best pizza. We went to the one down in Centralia there â€¦More

name: ashlee cliggett
text: Order was ready on time. Nice staff. Delicious pizza!

name: Nikkie S
text: I like coming here to get pizza from time to time. Employees are always friendly and Ive never had any issues with my orders.

text: Good food reasonably price

name: Cheryl Gurley

name: esther martinez
text: Best pizza I ever ate

name: Shari Underhill
text: Food is good but they DON'T take tv advertisment specials. You can order online and pick up. Staff is friendly. This is just a carryout location.

name: Denice Felicita
text: Small little place but great customer service

name: Morgan Lee
text: Love Pizza hut it's always good..

name: Stephanie Lawrence
text: Excellent Pizza and wings, as usual! Quick carry out service.  I only wish they delivered out to us!

name: Avva Ward
text: Canâ€™t take large bills. No bathroom? Makes you wonder where they go!

name: Steve Graves
text: Everytime I come to Pizza Hut I have experienced nothing but very pleasant employees and the service has been fast and the food is been delicious. And everyone in my family loves it.

name: Xodus 80
text:
Mess up delivery order every time.
Very rude when asked about forgotten items. No apologies at all. I will never order from these condescending jerks again
